question: Some people say that spending time to develop a successful career is the most important thing. Others say that spending time with friends and family is more important. Discuss both the view and give your opinion.
text: Education would be considered as a rudimentary requirement of an individual. Some people perceive that acquiring skills that helps in the future, jobs such as studying academic subjects or interpersonal communication is a crucial thing, provides opportunity to earn high; while others give more priority to their near and dear one, which provides moral support and happiness. This essay will discuss my stance with supporting arguments in further paragraphs.

To begin with, the foremost reason is that there are many people who are always ready to learn new things and they think that it would become a helpful for them to achieve their future goals.Even in the recent times, the competition is growing rapidly. So, the people must work more to gain the basic need of the life. For example, Research conducted shows that in the Megapolis monthly expenses had increased drastically compared to the past; this was the result of the exorbitant price of the basic product. Moreover, Momentarily, the entire world is converted into a small village with the use of the Internet. Acquiring facts and to grow your skills would become an easy. Although a person is attracted by the large incentive given by the multinational companies, this force to perform harder to acquire this position.

On the other hand, there are some people who things it would be better to spend their time with family and friends, as they provide support and care in any type of situation. This will help a person to achieve confidence and gives them physical and mental strength; with such marks gives strength them to do certain task attentively and result is converted in the good score. For instance, when children are learning a new skill like painting, parents can help them by providing support and encouraging them would become easy to excel in a particular skill.

In conclusion, by spending time with family and friends will gives positive energy which helps a person to acquire the goals. As per my opinion, this depends on an individual that how to balance job and family by giving appropriate time to them as each plays an impartial role in their life.
